amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $109 million from the Legal Services Corporation to the Drug Enforcement Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount appropriated for the Legal Services Corporation by $109,000,000 and to transfer that amount to the appropriation for salaries and expenses of the Drug Enforcement Administration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Radanovich amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 254 (Roll no. 342).
